title: You can now search for specific messages in Twitter DMs
content:
Twitter has been actively developing and adding new features to its platform lately. Earlier this week, the company started allowing iOS users to record GIFs directly through its built-in camera. And with Twitter Blue further expanding its features, the service is turning from a basic to a rich one that caters to different users. What

The post You can now search for specific messages in Twitter DMs appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Twitter is now rolling out the ability to search specific messages in DMs. The DMs search feature was limited to account names prior to this.
